main event: An unidentified flying object was observed in Cleveland, Ohio, with multiple reports recorded in the Project Blue Book from 1952 to 1969.
interesting points: There were a total of 57 sightings reported in 1979,The object was spotted moving in a northwesterly direction and made a slight turn before disappearing,One observer described the object as a silvery color and circular in shape,Weather conditions were mostly clear during the sightings,One witness reported seeing a second similar object shortly after the first one disappeared.
sighted object: silvery, circular object in the sky
witness description: The observer was a frequent witness of strange flying objects and was certain of what was observed.
